action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Captive Commuter Toll Relief Act
This bill modifies the limitations on the use of highway toll revenues to include toll discounts or rebates for use of a toll facility that has no reasonable alternative transportation method.
